alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Crazy Mountains; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:39PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Scattered showers and thunderstorms will move through parts of south central Montana this afternoon... Scattered showers and thunderstorms will move through the area this afternoon. These showers and storms will have the potential of producing strong wind gusts and light to moderate rain through 4 pm. The precipitation will be hit and miss, and therefore not every location will see strong winds or rainfall. HAZARD...Winds 35 to 50 mph where the storms go through. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Livingston, Red Lodge, Columbus, Big Timber, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Clyde Park, Worden, Huntley, Pryor, Cooke City, Ballantine, Lockwood, Fort Smith, Shepherd, Billings Heights and Billings West End. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
